name: Autoguild
description:
Autoguild is an RPG Auto-Battler strategy game where you progress and level up a guild of characters, heavily inspired by Hearthstone: Battlegrounds. The browser version is very choppy, but if you want, the windows version will run smoother. 

This game is very unfinished, as per the DEMO on the menu. Balance can be all over the place, and is subject to crash. One ability I know for certain that causes many crashes is ICE BINDING and ICE SHIELD. If you find anything breaking or wrong feel free to post it, however I don't plan on furthering the development of this game. Nevertheless hopefully it provided some amount of enjoyment to any of you. TYTYTY <3
